duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and grow the client relationship with a strategic multi-industry retailer, driving actionable insights and revenue growth.
Respond to client requests for insights using existing databases, industry knowledge, and internal collaboration.
Demonstrate usage of retail point-of-sale scanner data and consumer panel data to partner with the retailer.
Improve ongoing reporting to provide increased value and efficiencies while integrating data into the client’s decision-making processes.
Evaluate how products and services can address key business issues and introduce new products to clients.
Leverage industry analysts, practice area counterparts, and corporate resources to improve insights derived from data.
Conduct engaging and impactful presentations to deliver value to the client and listen to the customer's needs.
Build relationships throughout the customer's organization and manage time and activities effectively.
Embrace opportunity and customer management processes and systems, demonstrating a strong work ethic and attention to detail.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field (Master's preferred)
